terms_hint: By continuing, you agree to our
terms_and_condition_content:
Using the application constitutes your agreement to comply with all the terms and conditions set forth.
You must be 18 years of age or older to use the application.
You must not use the application for any illegal or unlawful activities.
We are not responsible for any issues arising between members or users as a result of assistance exchanges.
We reserve the right to change the terms of service at any time without prior notice.
We do not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided by users, and users bear full responsibility for using this information.
The application must be used appropriately and in accordance with local laws and regulations.
We do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or safety of the information provided by users. 
This app collects your contact list to enable you to share contact information with your friends. We do not share this data with third parties.
This app collects User image data to enhance user experience by providing personalized content. We do not share this data with third parties. 
We reserve the right to terminate a user's account if any terms of service are violated.

uploadImageMessage: We need access to your photo gallery to let you upload an image This will allow you to select a photo from your device that you want to upload The selected image will be used as your profile picture and stored securely on our servers You can update or delete your profile picture at any time We respect your privacy Your image will only be used within the app and won't be shared with third parties without your consent.
uploadContactsMessage:
To improve your experience and help you connect with your friends, this app needs access to your contact list.
 Your privacy is important to us and your contacts will be saved and used only to identify and suggest contacts to your friends who also use the app.
 You can manage and remove contacts you don’t want to share at any time in the app’s settings.
onBoarding_sub_title_1: Educational courses on prayer, providing you with comprehensive educational content
onBoarding_sub_title_2: Reminder of prayer times and organize your daily prayer schedule
onBoarding_sub_title_3: Performing prayers, where you can record your prayers and personal notes
logoLabel: Towards a Muslim community that prays
firstLevelSubtitle: Set a schedule for the five obligatory prayers throughout the week Allocate a specific time each day to perform each obligatory prayer in order Determine a quiet and comfortable place to perform the obligatory prayers without distraction or preoccupation Prepare the necessary materials such as books and notes before starting each obligatory prayer Avoid procrastination and adhere to the specified schedule to ensure performing the obligatory prayers
